name: GIST Advisory Switzerland Sarl
goal: Our mission is to become a world leading advisory & research firm which helps governments, institutions and corporations discover, measure, value and manage their externalities: preparing them for a green and inclusive economy of permanence.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives: EU initiatives related to The Economics of Ecosystems and Biodiversity (TEEB), TEEB for Agriculture and Food, Green Economy and Circular Economy.
